name: Happy Days Quiz
snippet: The happy days quiz is an excerpt of questions from QuizMoz Happy Days Quiz. It will tests your knowledge of the popular TV show from the 70s and 80s. The Happy Days Quiz questions are carefully crafted so you can gauge how much you know about Richie and the gang.

questions.question: In what year did "Happy Days" debut?
We saw very little of Richie and Joanie's older brother. He was quickly written out of the show. What was his name?
The first two seasons of "Happy Days" were shot in front of a life audience.
Marion Ross and what other actor from "Happy Days" were the only actors to stay with the show from its pilot to the very end. Who is the other actor?
Ralph's father did what for a living?
What would Ralph Malph say after telling a joke?
What was the name of Leather Tuscadero's band?
what was fonzi's jaket coler in the first couple seasons
answers: Black through out the entire show

questions.question: What do Potsie and Richie have to do to get into the Demons?
Who challenged Fonzie to jump the shark?
